div.p: This case-sensitive code system https://voicecollab.ai/fhir/CodeSystem/dsm5-q2 defines the following codes:

tr.td: I do not feel more self-confident than usual.
I occasionally feel more self-confident thanusual.
I often feel more self-confident than usual
I frequently feel more self-confident than usual.
I feel extremely self-confident all of the time.

description.value: The codes required for dsm5 q2 questionnaire

display.value: I do not feel more self-confident than usual.
I occasionally feel more self-confident thanusual.
I often feel more self-confident than usual
I frequently feel more self-confident than usual.
I feel extremely self-confident all of the time.
